Name: Figurine
Description: A miniature concubine figurine, finely worked but unfortunately incomplete. There is some detail and the piece is well polished.Such figurines may have been placed in the tombs of both male and females, their function being to symbolise the sexual aspects of rebirth and regeneration. Such female figures were often made of clay or faience and were truncated at the knees, they were found in both tombs and houses.
